head.description: Query for Event RSVPs by event
head.title: Meetup RSVPs v2

event.name: Horseback Riding & Lunch at Carousel Horse Farm

item.comments: I'd go if a spot opens up. I played polo for years and switched over to Standardbred race horses (harness horses with sulkies) in 1999, but still like to ride whenever the opportunity arises! :)

event.name: Horseback Riding & Lunch at Carousel Horse Farm
